name: Yu-Gi-Oh: We Are Friends, Right?
description:
An incredibly short Yu-Gi-Oh game. It's literally less than 500 words long.
It's a bit of a test project as I learn how to upload games to this site, in preparation for the day I upload my proper, interactive Yu-Gi-Oh visual novel with multiple endings. 

This game doesn't have multiple endings though. It barely has one. :P
